almalinux-8.desc: AlmaLinux 8 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

almalinux-9.desc: AlmaLinux 9 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

debian-11.desc: Debian 11 (bullseye) 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

debian-12.desc: Debian 12 (bookworm) 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

oraclelinux-8.desc: OracleLinux 8 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

rocky-8.desc: Rocky 8 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

rocky-9.desc: Rocky 9 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

ubuntu-20.04.desc: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish). Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

ubuntu-22.04.desc: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (Focal Fossa). Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.
